name: CanDies
description:
A little witch was trying to find ingredients to make a bunch of candies for the upcoming Halloween festival. But oh no! She got trapped in the candy dungeon! So now she needs to fight her way through all three candy bosses to escape and return home so she can prepare her candies.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to dash
  • Left Click to shoot spell
  • Aim with your mouse

This game was made during DDCT Innovative Camp 2022 by the team Purple Bacteria (แบคทีเรียสีม่วง) with the following members:

  • Kontee Pimpron (Game Artist)
  • Praewa Chowong (Game Artist)
  • Thanaporn Poprateep (Game Artist)
  • Papran Tantaprapa (Programmer)
  • Punthep Uea-chuvoranon (Programmer)
